SQLNonTransientException(java.lang.Throw.Description: Constructs a SQLNonTransientException object with a given cause. The SQLState is initialized to null and the vendor code is initialized to 0. The reason is initialized to null if cause==null or to cause.toString() if cause!=null.

ClassDesc: The subclass of @B_java#sql#SQLException_E@ thrown when an instance where a retry of the same operation would fail unless the cause of the SQLException is corrected.
